definition: everything for self and selfish profit (idiom); with no regard for others/selfish/mercenary

sentences.english: Selfish picnickers litter the beach with food wrappers.
sentences.chinese: 自私的野餐者乱扔包装纸使海滩杂乱不堪。

sentences.english: Selfishness and unhappiness often go hard in hand.
sentences.chinese: 自私和不快常是连在一起的。

sentences.english: Extravagance and vanity had made him coldhearted and selfish.
sentences.chinese: 放荡和虚荣使他变得残忍自私。

sentences.english: The snowdrift game is a celebrated game used as metaphor for investigating cooperative behaviors between selfish individuals.
sentences.chinese: 著名的雪堆博弈是自私个体间的合作行为的一个隐喻。

sentences.english: The sectarian thinks that he has the sea ladled into his private pond.
sentences.chinese: 自私偏狭者以为他能将沧海之水全部舀进自己的池塘。

sentences.english: Selfishly will you possession, is don't want to share with anyone bell.
sentences.chinese: 自私地将迩占有，是不想与任何人分享迩。

sentences.english: We all can be selfish and behave badly at times.
sentences.chinese: 我们都是很自私的人，常常会表现得很糟糕。

sentences.english: We tend to think of hypochondria as a kind of selfishness.
sentences.chinese: 我们倾向于将强迫症视为某种自私的表现。

sentences.english: Cinderella lives with her cruel stepmother and two selfish stepsisters, who, jealous of her beauty and sweet temper, treat her as a servant.
sentences.chinese: 灰姑娘和他刻薄的后母与自私的姐姐住在一起。

sentences.english: Some selfish Chinese politicians are considered to be "typhoid Marys " to their own people.
sentences.chinese: 一些自私自利的中国政客，是自己同胞祸害的根源。

sentences.english: Enticement and rational coexisting, but the human is selfish.
sentences.chinese: 诱惑与理性并存，可是，人毕竟是自私的。
有时，我并不会考虑那么周到并且自私。

sentences.english: Nolooks in our project likes Jair conditioningk seeing as they's too selfish.
sentences.chinese: 我们这个项目里没有人喜爱杰克，因为他太自私。

sentences.english: The selfishness of man is a great force to push social productivity forward in prac tieal life.
sentences.chinese: 人的自私性，是推动社会生产力发展的强大动力。

sentences.english: But all this is very selfish, I have heard some of my townsmen say.
sentences.chinese: 可是，这一切是很自私呵，我听到一些市民们这样说。

sentences.english: At the very core of envy … you will find selfishness and self-centeredness.
sentences.chinese: 在每一个嫉妒的中心，你一定会发现自私和自我中心。

definition: everything for self and selfish profit (idiom); with no regard for others/selfish/mercenary
to believe oneself infallible (idiom)/to be opinionated
